attributes.action: Give Gordon Banks England's World Cup Goal Keeping Hero a Knighthood
attributes.background: Gordon was an outstanding member of the England side in the 60's and 70's often as Captain and played in the winning World Cup final side of 1966. Bobby Charlton et-al were given knighthoods but Gordon only received a MBE. Overcoming serious injury and illness Gordon he's continued his charity work.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
